name: Hunters (Crusher17)
description:
This Game is a RPG style game where you have to kill multiple enemies with your sword and go to different worlds with portals.

  • This game includes the use of weapons like swords to defeat enemies.
  • A simple health pickup.
  • Stamina downs as you start sprint .
  • Various overlap events.
  • Simple Enemy behavior (not include the use of behavior trees and blackboard)
  • Enemy can move towards you and attack you.
  • Coin collection in multiple levels.
  • Properly sets the HUD with user widget classes.
  • Advance pause menu
  • Different weapon categories like Rare, Legendary, Epic.
  • Different game mechanics like floating platforms,  Switch to open gates
  • Making the use animation montages and notify system.
  • Includes the use of various animation properties and functions like FABRIK, Rotate Root Bone, Blend Between Poses, Layered Blend etc.
  • Game also includes health and stamina bars.
Source code :-
  • This game is fully coded in c++ with the use of Object Oriented Programming.
  • In this game I prefered to first create basic class which is parent to several child classes.
  • All the game code can be accessible via my Github(Crusher90).
  • Some small chunk of code was done in blueprints itself.
